     OoooOoooOOOo It's about that time I start showing off some teasers for this thing!  As of right now, I could package what I have and deliver a very playable 5 minute demo.  BUT WHERE'S THE FUN IN THAT!  Despite the laundry list of bugfixes I've had to remedy, I've been (admittedly) on a slow pace for the past two days.
